text: John Jairo Bedoya Jr. (December 28, 1977 â€“ August 16, 2020) was an American professional wrestler, better known by his ring name, Xavier. He was best known for his appearances with Ring of Honor between 2002 and 2004, where he was the second ROH Champion. Bedoya died on August 16, 2020 at the age of 42. ==References== Category:1977 births Category:2020 deaths Category:American professional wrestlers Category:Sportspeople from New York City Category:Sportspeople from Hartford, Connecticut
title: Xavier (wrestler)
